diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Spontaneous direct carotid-cavernous fistula (CCF) associated with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome Type IV
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Infected orbital vein thrombosis, Not specified
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the patient's history of sudden-onset periorbital pain, progressive exophthalmos, and imaging findings from cerebral angiography demonstrating a severely dysplastic internal carotid artery (ICA) and a left-sided direct CCF.
